title: SMIDO Main Flowchart - Complete Mâ†’Tâ†’Iâ†’Dâ†’O Workflow
description: Complete SMIDO troubleshooting methodology showing all phases from initial fault report through diagnosis (4 P's: Power, Procesinstellingen, Procesparameters, Productinput) to component isolation. Includes decision points, feedback loops, and escalation procedures.
agent_usage: Primary decision tree structure for agent. Use to guide technician through complete SMIDO workflow, reference current step, validate all steps followed, and navigate between phases.

title: SMIDO 4 P's Diagnosis Detail
description: Detailed breakdown of the Diagnose phase showing all 4 P's: P1 (Power - electrical supply checks), P2 (Procesinstellingen - settings vs design like pressostaat, thermostat, timers, controller), P3 (Procesparameters - measurements vs design like pressures, temperatures, superheat, subcooling), P4 (Productinput - external conditions vs design like load, ambient, airflow, door frequency).
agent_usage: Guide systematic diagnosis by generating diagnostic checklists, mapping to specific measurement tools, and structuring diagnostic findings. Critical for implementing 4 P's methodology correctly.
mermaid_code:
flowchart TD D[D - DIAGNOSE
De 3 P's + Product Input] --> P1 P1[P1: POWER
Voeding/Spanning] P1 --> P1a[Spanning aanwezig?] P1 --> P1b[Zekeringen intact?] P1 --> P1c[Vermogensschakelaars OK?] P1 --> P1d[Motor/compressor
stroomopname?] P1 --> P2 P2[P2: PROCESINSTELLINGEN
Parameters/Setpoints] P2 --> P2a[Thermostaat
instellingen] P2 --> P2b[Pressostaat
waarden] P2 --> P2c[Tijdschakelaars] P2 --> P2d[Regelaar
configuratie] P2 --> P3 P3[P3: PROCESPARAMETERS
Metingen] P3 --> P3a[Zuigdruk] P3 --> P3b[Persdruk] P3 --> P3c[Verdamptemperatuur] P3 --> P3d[Condenstemperatuur] P3 --> P3e[Oververhitting] P3 --> P3f[Onderkoeling] P3 --> P4 P4[P4: PRODUCTINPUT
Omgevingscondities] P4 --> P4a[Productbelading] P4 --> P4b[Omgevingstemperatuur] P4 --> P4c[Luchtstroom] P4 --> P4d[Deur frequentie]

title: Frozen Evaporator Example - Complete SMIDO Workflow (A3 Case)
description: Complete troubleshooting workflow for frozen evaporator (ingevroren verdamper) demonstrating full SMIDO methodology with data integration. M: Symptoms (temp too high, ice formation), T: Visual inspection (thick ice layer), I: Review defrost cycle settings, D: Measure suction line temperature (P3), O: Manual defrost, clean ducts, calibrate thermostat. Maps to vlog A3 case and telemetry flags.
agent_usage: Demo scenario showing complete SMIDO workflow. Use as template for other failure modes, show data source integration (manual + vlog + telemetry), and validate agent logic completeness.

title: VSM Data Integration Architecture
description: System architecture diagram showing how VSM agent integrates three data sources: Telemetry (785K datapoints â†’ WorldState features), Manuals (922 chunks â†’ ~200 sections), Vlogs (15 clips â†’ 5 cases). Data flows through Weaviate for semantic search and agent tools.
agent_usage: Documentation and system overview for development. Not for runtime troubleshooting - this is meta-level architecture reference for understanding VSM design.
mermaid_code:
flowchart TD Start([Fault Reported]) --> Agent[VSM Agent] Agent --> SMIDO[SMIDO Methodology] SMIDO --> M[M - Melding] SMIDO --> T[T - Technisch] SMIDO --> I[I - Installatie] SMIDO --> D[D - Diagnose 3P's] SMIDO --> O[O - Onderdelen] M --> Data1[Data Sources] T --> Data1 I --> Data1 D --> Data1 O --> Data1 Data1 --> Telemetry[Telemetry

15 columns] Data1 --> Manuals[Manuals
3 documents
922 chunks] Data1 --> Vlogs[Video Logs
15 clips
5 cases] Telemetry --> Features[WorldState
Features
60+ metrics] Features --> Current[Current state] Features --> Trends[Trends 30m-24h] Features --> Health[Health scores] Features --> Flags[Boolean flags] Manuals --> Sections[Manual Sections
~200 sections] Sections --> SMIDO_Docs[SMIDO steps] Sections --> Cases[Case studies] Sections --> Tables[Diagnostic tables] Sections --> Photos[Photos/diagrams] Vlogs --> Metadata[Vlog Metadata
5 cases + 15 clips] Metadata --> Problems[Problem phase] Metadata --> Triage[Triage phase] Metadata --> Solutions[Solution phase] Current --> Tools[Agent Tools] Trends --> Tools Health --> Tools Flags --> Tools SMIDO_Docs --> Tools Cases --> Tools Tables --> Tools Problems --> Tools Triage --> Tools Solutions --> Tools Tools --> Weaviate[Weaviate Vector DB] Weaviate --> Query[Semantic Search] Query --> Response[Troubleshooting
Guidance] Response --> Technician[Junior Technician]

title: Koelproces in Balans - Cooling Process Balance
description: System balance diagram showing bidirectional relationships between components (Expansieorgaan, Verdamper, Compressor, Condensor) and factors (Koudemiddel hoeveelheid, Koellast, Motorvermogen, Lucht/water, Omgevingstemperatuur). Balance states: Ondergrens (too low), Bandbreedte (OK range), Bovengrens (too high). Critical for understanding 'uit balans' concept - faults aren't always broken components.
agent_usage: Explain 'Koelproces uit balans' concept during diagnosis. Identify which factor is out of balance, help technician understand system interactions, and determine which measurements are needed. Critical for W vs C (WorldState vs Context) comparison.

title: Troubleshooting Table Structure - Response Template
description: Linear flow template for structuring troubleshooting responses: Verschijnselen (Symptoms with location) â†’ Mogelijke oorzaken (Possible causes numbered 1-3) â†’ Oplossingen (Solutions - what to check). Provides standard format for agent to organize diagnostic findings and communicate clearly with technician.
agent_usage: Format troubleshooting advice using this structure. Organize findings in symptom â†’ cause â†’ solution flow. Use for structured output and generating troubleshooting reports.

title: Basic Refrigeration Cycle - 4 Main Components
description: Circular flow diagram showing the basic cooling cycle with 4 main components: Compressor (pressure increase, gas to high-pressure gas), Condensor (heat rejection, hot gas to subcooled liquid), Expansieventiel (pressure drop, liquid to low-pressure mixture), Verdamper (heat absorption, two-phase to superheated gas). Shows pressure zones (Hoge druk / Lage druk) and refrigerant state changes.
agent_usage: Teach basic cooling cycle and verify technician understanding (I phase - Installatie Vertrouwd). Use for component identification, explaining refrigerant flow path, and foundation for more complex diagrams.

title: Cooling Installation with Instrumentation - Measurement Points
description: Complete cooling cycle schematic showing WHERE to measure pressures (P) and temperatures (T). Four measurement locations: P1/T1 (high P&T after compressor), P2 (high P after condenser), P3 (low P after expansion valve), P4/T4 (low P&T after evaporator). Shows heat flows (warmtetoevoer, warmteafvoer) and pressure zones. Critical for P3 Procesparameters phase.
agent_usage: Tell technician WHERE to measure during P3 Procesparameters diagnosis. Compare telemetry with expected values at each measurement point, guide through pressure/temp measurements, verify all sensors functioning, and map telemetry data to physical locations.

title: Pressostat Adjustment Logic - LP & HP Settings
description: Decision diagram showing pressostat settings for Low Pressure (LP - compressor start/stop based on suction pressure) and High Pressure (HP - safety cutout). LP: START (CUT IN) 0.7-7.5 bar, DIFF 0.35-7.5 bar. HP: STOP (CUT OUT) 7-28 bar, DIFF 6-14 bar. Shows Start/Stop/Diff relationships and logic for pressure control. Critical for diagnosing compressor short cycling issues.
agent_usage: Guide pressostat adjustment during P2 Procesinstellingen phase. Check if settings are correct, diagnose compressor cycling issues, help technician adjust settings, and verify HP cutout prevents over-pressure (safety).
